FAIL_TO_PASS: when implicit help option then help option not affected
when string contains trailing whitespace then returns string without trailing whitespace (trim right)
when argument has choices and default then both included in helpInformation
when enough width then wrap
when short flag obscured then help term is --help
when argument described then included in helpInformation
when helpOption has custom description then helpInformation include custom description
styleArgumentDescription
when help flags obscured then implicit help hidden
when custom .version then helpInformation includes custom version help
when argument described with default then included in helpInformation
when add custom help command then custom help command
when string has enough words to wrap then returns two wrapped lines
styleOptionDescription
styleOptionText
when string has enough words and escape sequences to wrap then returns wrapped line with break ignoring escape sequences
when arguments described in deprecated way and empty description then arguments still included in helpInformation
when default then help term is -h, --help
when default .version then helpInformation includes default version help
when set width 12 (and set minWrapWidth) then skip wrap
